text: Aru jitia taikhan etu hunise, taikhan phojurte mondoli bhitor te jai kene sikhaise. Kintu maha purohit aru jiman manu tai logote thakise taikhan bhi ahise, aru Israel laga bacha khan laga dangor chokra khan ke sabha te eke logote matise, aru bondhi ghor pora apostle khan ke loi anibole nimite pathaise.
